fields.name: Risk Avoider
fields.description: Minimize risk, preserve capital and target consistent returns, invest mainly in debt funds

fields.name: Risk Mitigator
fields.description: Take low to moderate risk and protect downside, large part of investment in debt funds with some upside from stocks

fields.name: Risk Balancer
fields.description: Take moderate risk, build wealth while protecting high downside, large part in stocks with some balance of debt funds

fields.name: Risk Manager
fields.description: Maximize returns in long and medium term while taking calculated high risks, large part of investment in stocks

fields.name: Risk Taker
fields.description: Take high risks over long term to maximize wealth, invest everything in stocks only
